Class JobStateServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.genie.web.services.impl.JobStateServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JobMetricsService, JobStateService
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JobMonitoringCoordinator

    public class JobStateServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements JobStateService
    A Service to monitor the state of locally run jobs.

    3.0.0
